member.name: T:EgsReport.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:EgsReport.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:EgsReport.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:EgsReport.CryptoService
member.summary: VB.NET translation of the provided crypto_service.ts - AES-128-CBC with PKCS7 padding (Set/Set_Old, Get/Get_Old) - HMAC-SHA256 -> hex -> BigInteger -> Base36 -> 25-char string (Get25CharString)

member.name: M:EgsReport.StandardDetail.fctMakeSectionHeader(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean,DevExpress.XtraPrinting.TextAlignment)
member.summary: Create a section header using XRTable control
member.param: String: Text to be displayed as the Section header
Integer: Position of the Section header in the X ordinate
Integer: Position of the Section header in the Y ordinate

member.name: M:EgsReport.StandardDetail.fctMakeDataRow(System.String[],System.Int32[],DevExpress.XtraPrinting.TextAlignment[],DevExpress.XtraPrinting.BorderSide,System.Drawing.FontStyle,System.Int32)
member.param: String(): Set of values to be inserted in a the table cell
Integer(): Set of values to be set on cell's width
TextAllignment(): Text ordering within the cell
BorderSide: Border style of the cell. Default is None.

member.name: M:EgsReport.StandardDetail.subDisplayNutrientComputation(System.Int32,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,EgsReport.StandardDetail.NutrientDisplayOption,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String)
member.param: Integer : Where to plot the control in the X axis
Integer : Where to plot the control in the Y axis
Optional NutrientDisplayOption : Option where user can display Calculated or Imposed nutrient or both.
